languages.text: "Идем. Я... я не верю, что больше никого не осталось. Понимаешь? Я не могу позволить змею в моей душе поглотить и без того угасающую надежду. Надежду узнать истину о судьбе Крудараха. Я зашла слишком далеко, чтобы попасть сюда, и не могу сдаться сейчас. Мы найдем и других провидцев. Обязательно найдем".

traits.locale_text: "Идем. Я... я не верю, что больше никого не осталось. Понимаешь? Я не могу позволить змею в моей душе поглотить и без того угасающую надежду. Надежду узнать истину о судьбе Крудараха. Я зашла слишком далеко, чтобы попасть сюда, и не могу сдаться сейчас. Мы найдем и других провидцев. Обязательно найдем".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."
languages.original_text: "Идем. Я... я не верю, что больше никого не осталось. Понимаешь? Я не могу позволить змею в моей душе поглотить и без того угасающую надежду. Надежду узнать истину о судьбе Крудараха. Я зашла слишком далеко, чтобы попасть сюда, и не могу сдаться сейчас. Мы найдем и других провидцев. Обязательно найдем".

traits.locale_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour the already fading hope. The hope to find the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We definitely will."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

languages.text: «Vámonos. Yo... me niego a creer que no quede nadie más. ¿Me entiendes? No permitiré que la serpiente de mi alma devore mis últimas esperanzas, mi anhelo de saber la verdad sobre lo que le ocurrió a Crudarach. Ahora ya no hay marcha atrás, he recorrido un camino muy largo para llegar hasta aquí. Encontraremos a otros videntes. Sé que lo haremos».
languages.original_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

traits.locale_text: «Vámonos. Yo... me niego a creer que no quede nadie más. ¿Me entiendes? No permitiré que la serpiente de mi alma devore mis últimas esperanzas, mi anhelo de saber la verdad sobre lo que le ocurrió a Crudarach. Ahora ya no hay marcha atrás, he recorrido un camino muy largo para llegar hasta aquí. Encontraremos a otros videntes. Sé que lo haremos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「行こう。我には…もう誰も残っていないなんて信じられない。分かるか？この魂の中の蛇に、すでに消えかけている希望を喰い尽くさせるわけにはいかないのだ。クルダラに起こったことの真実を突き止める希望を。ここまでたどり着いておいて今さら諦められるものか。他の先見司たちを見つけ出す。必ず」
languages.original_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

traits.locale_text: 「行こう。我には…もう誰も残っていないなんて信じられない。分かるか？この魂の中の蛇に、すでに消えかけている希望を喰い尽くさせるわけにはいかないのだ。クルダラに起こったことの真実を突き止める希望を。ここまでたどり着いておいて今さら諦められるものか。他の先見司たちを見つけ出す。必ず」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们走吧，我……我相信这里还有其他人。你能理解吗？我不能让我灵魂中的毒蛇噬我那微薄如丝的希望，那渴望寻得克鲁达拉赫真相的希望。我经历了那么多磨难才来到这里，不能在这种时候放弃。我们一定能找到其他先知，一定能。”
languages.original_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

traits.locale_text: “我们走吧，我……我相信这里还有其他人。你能理解吗？我不能让我灵魂中的毒蛇噬我那微薄如丝的希望，那渴望寻得克鲁达拉赫真相的希望。我经历了那么多磨难才来到这里，不能在这种时候放弃。我们一定能找到其他先知，一定能。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Partons. Je... je refuse de croire qu'il ne reste plus personne. Comprenez-vous ? Je ne peux pas laisser le serpent qui enserre mon âme dévorer le mince espoir qui me reste. Le mince espoir de découvrir la vérité quant au sort de Crudarach. Je ne peux pas abandonner maintenant, pas après tout ce que j'ai fait pour arriver ici. Nous trouverons d'autres Grands Prophètes. C'est certain. »
languages.original_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

traits.locale_text: « Partons. Je... je refuse de croire qu'il ne reste plus personne. Comprenez-vous ? Je ne peux pas laisser le serpent qui enserre mon âme dévorer le mince espoir qui me reste. Le mince espoir de découvrir la vérité quant au sort de Crudarach. Je ne peux pas abandonner maintenant, pas après tout ce que j'ai fait pour arriver ici. Nous trouverons d'autres Grands Prophètes. C'est certain. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Lasst uns gehen. Ich ... Ich will nicht glauben, dass es niemanden mehr gibt. Versteht Ihr das? Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass die Schlange in meiner Seele auch noch den Rest meiner Hoffnung verschlingt! Meine Hoffnung, die Wahrheit über Crudarach zu erfahren. Nach meinen ganzen Anstrengungen hierherzukommen, ist Aufgeben einfach keine Option. Wir werden andere Runenpropheten finden. Das werden wir."
languages.original_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst uns gehen. Ich ... Ich will nicht glauben, dass es niemanden mehr gibt. Versteht Ihr das? Ich werde nicht zulassen, dass die Schlange in meiner Seele auch noch den Rest meiner Hoffnung verschlingt! Meine Hoffnung, die Wahrheit über Crudarach zu erfahren. Nach meinen ganzen Anstrengungen hierherzukommen, ist Aufgeben einfach keine Option. Wir werden andere Runenpropheten finden. Das werden wir."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Gidelim. Ben... Geriye kimsenin kalmadığına inanmayı reddediyorum. Beni anlıyor musun? Ruhumdaki yılan, Crudarach'a olan bitenle ilgili hakikati öğrenmeye dair hâlihazırda azalan umudumu tamamen tüketmeyecek. İzin vermeyeceğim. Buraya varabilmek için sarf ettiğim onca çabadan sonra vazgeçmem. Diğer Ötesezenleri bulacağız. Evet, bulacağız."
languages.original_text: "Let us go. I... I refuse to believe there is no one else left. Do you understand? I cannot let the serpent in my soul devour my already fading hope. My hope of finding out the truth of what happened to Crudarach. There is no giving up now, after the lengths I have gone to in order to get here. We will find other Farseers. We will."

traits.locale_text: "Gidelim. Ben... Geriye kimsenin kalmadığına inanmayı reddediyorum. Beni anlıyor musun? Ruhumdaki yılan, Crudarach'a ne olduğu hakikatini bulmaya dair hâlihazırda azalan umudumu tamamen tüketmeyecek, izin vermeyeceğim. Buraya varabilmek için sarf ettiğim onca çabadan sonra artık vazgeçmek yok. Diğer Ötesezenleri bulacağız. Evet, bulacağız."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
